sentence.Network_en: "If we pay players, how far do we go?" Gresson asked pertinently.
sentence.Network_cn: “如果我们给乐手付酬，给多少合适？”格雷森进一步问道。

sentence.Network_en: Where had they learned all this, or, more pertinently, why had they remembered it?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从哪里了解到所有这些的？或者更确切地说，他们为什么会记得这件事？

sentence.Network_en: It is one thing to speak much and another to speak pertinently.
sentence.Network_cn: 说得多是一回事,讲得中肯又是一回事.

entry.def: Something that is pertinent is relevant to a particular subject.

example.ex: She had asked some pertinent questions...
example.tran: 她问了一些相关的问题。

example.ex: Pertinent information will be forwarded to the appropriate party.
example.tran: 有关信息将会转发给相关方。

sentences.sentence: "what is singular about his use of them is that no other artist, of his time or any other, has painted them so directly, intimately and pertinently"
